name: SCWindow
desc: An object that represents an onscreen window.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The string that displays in a windowâ€™s title bar.

items.name: var owningApplication: SCRunningApplication?
items.desc: The app that owns the window.

items.name: var windowLayer: Int
items.desc: The layer of the window relative to other windows.

items.name: var frame: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle the represents the frame of the window within a display.

items.name: var isOnScreen: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window is on screen.
